SEARCH
Module org.example

Package Controllers

package Controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ControllerEndScreen
    This class is the controller for the end screen After completing the quiz or entry game mode, information about the number of correct answers, current lvl, high streak, category name and how much lvl the user needs to level up will be displayed here
    ControllerFirstScreen
    This class is the controller for the first screen This is the first screen of the application where the user can log in or go to the password change or registration section
    ControllerLoginReminder
    This class is the controller for the reminder password screen This class handles the view logic responsible for remembering the user's password
    ControllerMainMenu
    This class is the controller for the main menu screen It handles user interactions and manages the behavior of the main menu UI elements
    ControllerProfile
    This class is the controller for the profile screen The screen displays information about the username, the current level and the number of points to the next level
    ControllerQuizGame
    This class is the controller for the quiz game screen Responsible for controlling the game in quiz mode
    ControllerRegister
    This class is the controller for the register screen This section allows you to create a user account
    ControllerResetPassword
    This class is the controller for the reset password screen This section allows you to reset the user's password
    ControllerWpisGame
    This class is the controller for the wpis game screen Responsible for controlling the game in wpis mode
